tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cocktails (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  popularity INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE ingredients (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE recipes (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cocktail_id INT REFERENCES cocktails(id),
  ingredient_id INT REFERENCES ingredients(id),
  quantity VARCHAR(20))

CREATE TABLE reviews (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cocktail_id INT REFERENCES cocktails(id),
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE events (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100))
